example_modid.msg: Custom msg on crash for this mod id. You can use $JAR_NAME$ placeholder, which will be replaced with jar name. You can use HTML here, it will work.

betterfps.msg:
BetterFPS is known to cause crashes with little to no performance gain. Many of the improvements are already included in other mods.
Fix: Delete $JAR_NAME$ from the mods folder.

clumps.msg:
Clumps is superseded by Fixeroo, which uses a better and more compatible implementation.
Fix: Delete $JAR_NAME$ from the mods folder.

fastbench.msg:
Fast Workbench has been merged and rewritten in CensoredASM.
Fix: Delete $JAR_NAME$ from the mods folder.

fastfurnace.msg:
Fast Furnace has been merged and rewritten in Universal Tweaks.
Fix: Delete $JAR_NAME$ from the mods folder.

performant.msg:
Performant is an empty mod jar. All code in the mod has been commented out.
Fix: Delete $JAR_NAME$ from the mods folder.
